<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust the number of fractional bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the common semantic for two semantics, with the added imposition that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// saturated padded types retain the padding bit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Convert an integer value with the given signedness to an integer value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// representing the given fixed-point semantic.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Src         - The source value</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p DstSema     - The resulting fixed-point semantic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#ac2cb8d79fa94ae788233f1af991fd9c4"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#ac2cb8d79fa94ae788233f1af991fd9c4">CreateIntegerToFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcIsSigned,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Convert(Src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aebc9b19a86db06690ffcc4904907e8be">FixedPointSemantics::GetIntegerSemantics</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">                       Src-&gt;getType()-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits(), SrcIsSigned),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">                   DstSema, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a00109923471ab72b20f0959d8eb230b9"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a00109923471ab72b20f0959d8eb230b9">CreateFixedToFloating</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;SrcSema,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;DstTy) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpTy = getAccommodatingFloatType(DstTy, SrcSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convert the raw fixed-point value directly to floating point. If the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value is too large to fit, it will be rounded, not truncated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = SrcSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>() ? B.CreateSIToFP(Src, OpTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">                                : B.CreateUIToFP(Src, OpTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rescale the integral-in-floating point by the scaling factor. This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lossless, except for overflow to infinity which is unlikely.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = B.CreateFMul(Result,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">        ConstantFP::get(OpTy, std::pow(2, -(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)SrcSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a5eb21a8a338a43390965253fb71d152d">getScale</a>())));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OpTy != DstTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = B.CreateFPTrunc(Result, DstTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a0a1c9934f39747a96a2b6b42d0bec03e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a0a1c9934f39747a96a2b6b42d0bec03e">CreateFloatingToFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;DstSema) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseSigned = DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>() || DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a516540ad4950d71de2266507041b9c6e">hasUnsignedPadding</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Result = Src;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpTy = getAccommodatingFloatType(Src-&gt;getType(), DstSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OpTy != Src-&gt;getType())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = B.CreateFPExt(Result, OpTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rescale the floating point value so that its significant bits (for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// purposes of the conversion) are in the integral range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = B.CreateFMul(Result,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">        ConstantFP::get(OpTy, std::pow(2, DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a5eb21a8a338a43390965253fb71d152d">getScale</a>())));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ResultTy = B.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#acaf8e4c3e40e01e848c1fad5f05b81cd">getIntNTy</a>(DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a2f3dab29dd773a1faa002a701261db99">getWidth</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a80add6b3b1cdaec560907995127adc16">Intrinsic::ID</a> IID =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">          UseSigned ? Intrinsic::fptosi&#95;sat : Intrinsic::fptoui&#95;sat;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = B.CreateIntrinsic(IID, &#123;ResultTy, OpTy&#125;, &#123;Result&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = UseSigned ? B.CreateFPToSI(Result, ResultTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">                         : B.CreateFPToUI(Result, ResultTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When saturating unsigned-with-padding using signed operations, we may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// get negative values. Emit an extra clamp to zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>() &amp;&amp; DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a516540ad4950d71de2266507041b9c6e">hasUnsignedPadding</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Zero = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#aa6574d526b3e38a28f688a7bb4325c2c">Constant::getNullValue</a>(Result-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">          B.CreateSelect(B.CreateICmpSLT(Result, Zero), Zero, Result, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;satmin&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add two fixed-point values and return the result in their common semantic.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p LHS     - The left hand side</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p LHSSema - The semantic of the left hand side</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p RHS     - The right hand side</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p RHSSema - The semantic of the right hand side</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#aa663208669ad36fe54f6eb540b5bbf9b"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#aa663208669ad36fe54f6eb540b5bbf9b">CreateAdd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;LHSSema,</Highlight></CodeLine>
